dialogue.introduction: I'm Akatsuki! Treat me like the fully-fledged lady that I am!
dialogue.library_intro: I'm the 1st of the special type-III destroyers Akatsuki. Based on the Fubuki-class, with improved performance and range, the last word in destroyers! I'm quite the lady, you know! R-really, I am....
dialogue.secretary2: Today's also a lucky day, yes?
dialogue.secretary3: Don't pat my head like that! Didn't I say that I'm not a child anymore?
dialogue.secretarymarried: C-c-c-commander, as you've done your best, I'll give you some praise. Stick out your head.
dialogue.wedding: To have a meal with the commander, just the two of us, as a lady.... Wait! Why do I have juice? Furthermore, why does the pilaf have a flag in it!
dialogue.show_players_score: A telegram for the Commander; please read it quickly.
dialogue.equipment1: Thank you. You have my regards.
dialogue.equipment2: You say that this equipment a bit big? It's obviously just the right size!
dialogue.supply: Thank you. I shall properly give my regards.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: It's not that I'm tired or anything, you know.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I'm only being deployed to tough battles, how troubling...
dialogue.docking_complete: It looks like there is a repaired ship!
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ship has been finished.
dialogue.mvp: No matter how you think about it, Akatsuki's the best!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: R-really, I won't forgive you... I really won't!
dialogue.sunk: To sink in a place like this, I hate it...

hourly.0000: It's 0000. The base is quiet as well, yes? It's so dark...
hourly.0100: 0100. A lady's beauty will be marred if they don't go to bed early, you know!
hourly.0200: 0200. C- Commander.... I'm a little concerned about the hallway. Could we go take a look together?
hourly.0300: 0300. It's not like I needed to go to the toilet or anything!
hourly.0400: 04...00... A lady's all-nighter is also perfect, no?
hourly.0600: 0...6...00... Ah... Don't they say 'The well sleeping child grows up well'?
hourly.0700: 07...00.. Eh, no way! I'm completely late, aren't I!
hourly.0800: 0800. Commander you're stupid! Dummy! Why didn't you wake me up! Huh? Comma~nder!
hourly.0900: 0900. A lady prepares for the morning without delay.
hourly.1000: 1000. Wha-! There's nobody here at all!
hourly.1100: 1100. Ah, they're back~! You're all mean, all going off on expeditions!
hourly.1200: 1200. A-hem! While you all were away, Akatsuki looked after the base all by herself!
hourly.1300: 1300. Well then, feel free to treat me to a luxurious lunch, ok?
hourly.1400: 1400. Why does a luxurious lunch have a flag standing in i~t!... well, I quite like fried prawns, hamburger and spaghetti anyway.
hourly.1500: 1500. Don't say "Hey, isn't this grand"! I'll pout!
hourly.1600: 1600. Well then, Akatsuki, as a first-class lady, will make a name for herself in the world.
hourly.1700: 1700. Well, let's go and do our best~
hourly.1800: 1800. Whew, breaks are vital for ladies as well, no?
hourly.1900: 1900. Commander, do we have anything like herb tea around, I wonder? ...No, I guess not.
hourly.2000: 2000. Akatsuki's do-your-best curry is done! How is it, how is it?
hourly.2100: 2100. Eh? It's mild, you say? But, I thought I made it plenty spicy...
hourly.2200: 2200. Well then, from now on it's the adults - the ladies' time!
